summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.9 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1781 m) and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 197.5m lower than yesterday, 681.0m lower than the past week, 1781.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 869.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1550.5m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, occasional overcast conditions, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
